      • X_FORWARDED_FOR_HEADER

        public static final java.lang.String X_FORWARDED_FOR_HEADER
        Common HTTP Request Headers related to Client IP address. These are according HTTP Specification.

        If you want to support more Client IP related headers, kindly create a constant here and also make appropriate changes in getClientIP() method available in CommonUtil Class.
